references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of deep learning, establishing its core concepts and techniques.

references.paper_title: Mastering the game of Go with deep neural networks and tree search
references.reason: This paper showcased a significant milestone in AI, demonstrating the power of deep learning in achieving superhuman performance in a complex game.

references.paper_title: DSD: Dense-sparse-dense training for deep neural networks
references.reason: This work introduced a novel training method, DSD, to enhance the efficiency and generalizability of deep neural networks, particularly relevant to the paper's focus on small datasets.
This paper presented the Born Again Networks (BANs) approach, a weight reinitialization method that improves generalization and is directly related to the DNR method.
This study directly inspired the Dynamic Neural Regeneration framework, serving as a key predecessor in the iterative training paradigm with weight reinitialization.
